title: Ticket #1151: Check configure script into git
description: The general expectation of someone trying to build Condor, from the source tarball or from git, is "./configure && make". However, we don't make our configure script available in that form; you need to run ./build_init to generate it first. We should commit our configure script into git so it Just Works for your average person.
